Hi i am new to KSP Forums so please introduce me emmm..... things/who is who/rules/other stuff

Howewer i Started playing KSP in version 0.90 when i started game was boring but after doing my first Orbit [Polar] i founded new things to do so everytime i executed KSP.exe i founded new things to do and i failed 60% of the time

Yes its short but i am not a writer and i dont write much but i have a question if i change directory of KSP how i can make Program detect its new directory ?

Hello, @64Bit, and welcome aboard!

I'm Dman979. I've been here since 2014. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask me or any other forum member. I'm sure you'll find we're all happy to help!

Since you've been playing from 0.90, I assume you have the gameplay basics down. The forum rules are right here, but if you need them in the future, go all the way to the top and click on "Guidelines." The mod staff is great here (and no, they're not paying me to say that!), and will be more than willing to answer any questions you have. In fact, there's an entire thread for that in "Kerbal Network" subforum, located here.

As a general rule of thumb, the moderators prefer it if you report posts to them rather than enage in "backseat moderating."

Other stuff? We're a friendly community here, but we can get quite heated simetimes. Don't worry, nothing here is ever meant as a personal attack, so feel free to ask any questions you need, and don't worry about feeling "dumb"- we've all been there at one time or another.

I don't know how you'd make the program detect a new directory. I suggest asking in the "Technical Support" subforums.

Have fun!
Here, have a like!  Likes on the house!

Hello 64Bit and welcome to the KSP Forums!

Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
